docs.lead_paragraph: WOLFEBORO, N.H. — Sounding very much like a general election candidate, former Gov. Mitt Romney of Massachusetts on Tuesday set out an argument for ousting President Obama, whom he again blamed for worsening the recession and slowing the recovery.
docs.abstract: Campaigning in New Hampshire on Tuesday, Mitt Romney once again blamed President Obama for worsening the recession.
docs.snippet: Campaigning in New Hampshire on Tuesday, Mitt Romney once again blamed President Obama for worsening the recession.
